<Link id="l00021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="21"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Deduce the least significant bit aligned shift and mask values for a binary</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="22"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Complement \\p Value (as they&#39;re defined in SIDefines.h as C&#95;&#42;) as a returned</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="23"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// pair&lt;shift, mask&gt;. That is to say \\p Value == ~(mask &lt;&lt; shift)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// For example, given C&#95;00B848&#95;FWD&#95;PROGRESS (i.e., 0x7FFFFFFF) from</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// SIDefines.h, this will return the pair as (31,1).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu/#abc35cd2c7c1b70aedaf4e2cd857688ab"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">constexpr</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> std::pair&lt;unsigned, unsigned&gt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu/#abc35cd2c7c1b70aedaf4e2cd857688ab">getShiftMask</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Shift = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Mask = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Mask = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">~Value</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="32"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (; !(Mask &amp; 1); Shift++, Mask &gt;&gt;= 1) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="36"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="37"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="38"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Provided with the MCExpr &#42; \\p Val, uint32 \\p Mask and \\p Shift, will return</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="39"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// the masked and left shifted, in said order of operations, MCExpr &#42; created</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// within the MCContext \\p Ctx.</span></CodeLine>
